node.name: Thematic Investment
node.description: Designing user experience and mobile interface for an automated wealth management platform, allowing users to invest in sectors or industries of their interests.
node.myRole: As a lead designer, I worked directly with the CEO and a product manager to ideate user experience for the featAure and gather product and business requirements. I explored UI options and got feedback from both product and development teams before finalizing the design and writing a product spec to hand off the project.
node.results: A working feature that provided an additional investment strategy for users and increased 60% of the company's total assets under management (AUM) within the first 3 months after its launch.

node.name: Hacker Application Portal
node.description: Designing a unique comic-themed application portal for applicants to submit their personal information and answer questions.
node.myRole: I was a lead designer, working with an application lead, a graphic designer and a team of 4 developers on this project.
node.results: A working responsive application portal used by over 7000+ applicants around the world to apply for Canada's biggest hackathon.

node.name: Hackioca
node.description: Designing the world's first boba hackathon website for Hack the North to launch on April's Fool day.
node.myRole: I was a lead designer, working with a graphic designer and a team of 4 developers.
node.results: A responsive website that helped promote Hack the North online. The design of the website also got featured on 'subtle asian traits', a Facebook group with over 1.9 million members.

node.name: Custom Form Builder
node.description: Building tools for administrators to monitor and manage users accounts.

node.name: User Account Management
node.description: Building tools for administrators to monitor and manage users accounts.
node.myRole: As a lead designer, I worked with the product manager to gather requirements and participated in design critiques to get design feedback. I also ran a usability inspection to test each variation of my design. In the end, I wrote a design spec to hand off the project to a team of remote developers.
node.results: High-fidelity wireframes ready for developers to implement.

node.name: T-Shirt Design
node.description: Making PlanGrid be on UWaterloo students' radar.

node.name: Picking Process Experience
node.description: Understanding forklift operator’s goals and pain points to design a user-friendly picking process.
node.myRole: I created a user journey map and redesigned a pallet picking feature to solve the forklift operator's pains. I initially learned about the users and their problems through conversations with interviewed professional service consultants. Later, I went to manufacturing sites to interview forklift operators and observe their workflows.
node.results: A user journey map posters for Nulogy internal teams and high-fidelity wireframes for the improvements on the pallet picking features.

node.name: Craft Beer Ordering System
node.description: Establishing a reliable online ordering system to replace phone orders.
node.myRole: I had a meeting with LCBO teams to learn about their problems and ideated potential solutions. I later designed the wireframes and worked with a group of software interns to create the prototype.
node.results: A working prototype to demomstrate how the product could solve user pain points.

node.name: Tasting Note Mobile App
node.description: A data collecting mobile application, designed as an initiative to replace existing paper forms for evaluating beverage products.
node.myRole: I worked with a product manager to learn about existing problems in the beverage evaluation process. I examined user flow and created wireframes before designing a clickable prototype to present the concept.
node.results: A clickable prototype used to present the concept to LCBO product consultants. The work done in this project was later picked up by another intern to create a high-fidelity prototype after my internship was over.

node.name: Daily UI
node.description: A collection of my UI design practices.

node.title: Jitta Wealth
node.description: Designing wealth management mobile application for a fintech company, making investment become easier and more accessible in Thailand.

node.description: Designing website & applications for Canada’s biggest hackathon, connecting over 1,300 students around the world to collaboratively build innovative projects.

node.description: Solving complex supply chain management problems through a series of user research, wireframing, and prototyping.

node.title: LCBO
node.description: Digitizing repetitive and error-prone manual processes to reduce task completion time and potential human errors.
